title: Data Engineer Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. I interviewed at Forgotten Harvest (Detroit, MI) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: I am on a greenfield project, so I doubt my experience will be typical.  The interview started off with a run down of where the company is and in general where they want to go with setting up a new datacenter.  I was asked about my previous projects as well as volunteer work I have done.  Also, I was asked about some business knowledge and whether I really knew how Data Engineering could be beneficial for an organization.  Finally, they just wanted to make sure I understood how in-house analytics and predictive modeling would work.
Interview Questions: What are projects or work you have done in the past that stand out to you?
